kwargs.name: index_header
kwargs.content:
Hello, let's start!
You can change the view of this page in admin settings.

kwargs.name: index_description
kwargs.content:
To add or delete groups of skills edit parameters with group "skill_group".
Add your skills by creating parameters with group value equals to group name.
Rate your skill by creating parameter with group equals to skill name and value from 1 to 5. Add certificates by creating "certificates" group parameters with a link as a value.
